get_public

Source: R/public.R
get_public.Rd

Return dataframe of public advisory data.

Status

Classification of storm, e.g., Tropical Storm, Hurricane, etc.

Name

Name of storm

Adv

Advisory Number

Date

Date of advisory issuance

Key

Unique ID of the cyclone

Contents

Text content of product

get_public(links)

Arguments

links

URL to storm's archive page.

See also

get_storms, public
